name: Virtual product checkout field manager for WooCommerce
author: Mehedi Hasan

sections.description:
Virtual product checkout field manager for WooCommerce is an awesome plugin with nice admin control to hide checkout fields for virtual and downloadable products.

In admin settings you will get all the checkout fields, Shipping controller and order notes. So you are can hide any checkout fields for your Digital or virtual products. It will give your customer easy checkout process that will increase your sales.

Key Benefits of site owner

🔑 Boost your sales
🔑 Higher conversion rates
🔑 Encourage customers to buy quickly.

💁 Key features Virtual product checkout field manager for WooCommerce

  • Dynamically load all the checkout fields in the admin panel
  • Hide billing fields
  • Hide shippings fields
  • Hide order notes
  • Easy admin to manage checkout fields for virtual products
  • Nice looking settings page
  • Admin page saves value with Ajax so it will give nice experience of saving fields
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin. Upload the unzipped folder to the wp-contents/plugins folder of your WordPress installation.
  2. Active the plugin from the WordPress Plugins administration page.
  3. OR, Got to WP admin panel, click ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Add new’. In the search input box, type ‘Virtual product checkout field manager for WooCommerce’.
  4. Install and activate the plugin.
  5. Once activated you will see the settings link in plugin just click on it and it will take you to the setting page where you can enable and disable checkout fields for Virtual / Digital products.
